About Services Process Clients Contact

Nettles Consulting is on a mission to maximize independent agency performance.

The purchase of an agency management system alone is not enough to maintain a competitive advantage in today’s e-commerce markets. Without proper implementation and workflow planning, an agency will never reap the benefits of this costly software purchase.

Working with independent agencies of all sizes, Nettles Consulting has developed proven methodologies and tools to elevate your agency operations. The Nettles process takes agencies from an initial assessment to preactive strategizing to implementation of intelligent workflows in a manner that involves all levels of your agency.

Services

  • Operational Assesment

    We conduct a comprehensive interview and evaluation of your service staff to identify opportunities to deliver an improved return on your technology investment.

  • Pre-Active Planning

    Preactive Planning sessions are designed to help agency leadership look beyond today's technology deliverables and define a vision for your customers.

  • Benchmarking

    Benchmarking provides a measurable assessment about how your internal operations measure up against your vision as well as industry best practices.

  • Workflow Development & implementation

    Using your staff, a task force approach is employed to establish workflows which include detailed steps, quality control guidelines, and service standards to eliminate E&O and improve operational efficiency.

  • Information Managment

    Electronic filing is here to stay. Paper files are a thing of the past. Whether it is with your current agency management system or a third party document management vendor…

  • Monitoring

    Creating workflows and providing workflow training establishes a foundation upon which to build. The goal of the audit/monitoring process is to…
